meta.title: Our Progress | Pledge & Grow
meta.description: Explore our journey, milestones, and achievements as we continue to grow and make a positive impact in the digital landscape.

roadmap.title: Roadmap
roadmap.description: Discover our strategic vision and upcoming milestones as we continue to innovate and expand our offerings.
roadmap.updatedQuarterly: Updated quarterly based on industry trends and client needs

aiIntegration.title: AI Integration
aiIntegration.description: Implementing AI solutions for predictive analytics and automation

blockchain.title: Blockchain Solutions
blockchain.description: Secure, scalable blockchain infrastructure for businesses

security.title: Enhanced Security
security.description: Next-generation security protocols for enterprise applications

integration.title: Internal Application
integration.description: Unified platform for connecting our business systems

anonymity.title: Innovation Hub
anonymity.description: Development of applications tied to innovations and supporting projects as an incubator

futureVision.title: What's Up
futureVision.description: Here's what we currently offer and support. Our services and capabilities are constantly evolving to meet client needs.

crypto.title: Cryptocurrencies
crypto.description: We currently accept payments in most utilized cryptocurrencies and stablecoins. Will soon be available in France.

charity.title: Charity
charity.description: Pledge & Grow is dedicated to helping others and occasionally works for free on projects dedicated to humanity or charity. Feel free to reach out.

team.title: Team
team.description: Our team is constantly evolving, a lot of people come and go. We limited our board member size to 10 members with 5 active currently.

membership.title: Membership
membership.description: We plan to add more benefits overtime. VIP have access to community groups and full support, they don't have to go through the waitlist

realtime.title: AI Support
realtime.description: Currently supporting OpenAI and Claude integration, we're also researching other AI such as Gemini, Deepseek, Grok and others to provide enhanced support solutions.

international.title: Privacy
international.description: You can choose to not appear on our website, have us sign NDAs, or communicate through privacy apps. We also provide support for building onion websites.

cta.title: Join Us
cta.description: Be part of our growth story and help us shape the future.
